div.p: To Maximus alias Nearchos, strategus of the Arsinoite (nome), division of Herakleides, from Herakleides, son of Chairemon, a public farmer. Since I owed wheat to the state for the public fields that I farm, and a certain Syrus owes (me?) …, wishing …, having taken refuge with you, I beg you, the saviour of all, … Translation: N. Gonis, ZPE 229 (2024) 168
